revised_title: Charles Alfred Coulson: A Life of Science and Faith
tldr: Charles Coulson was a versatile scientist who made significant contributions to physics, chemistry, and mathematics. He was also deeply religious and dedicated his life to combining his love for science and faith. Coulson's work in theoretical chemistry, particularly his studies on molecular structure and graphite, had a lasting impact on the field. His life was marked by a strong sense of purpose and a commitment to using his talents for the betterment of society.
